Q_DECLARE_FLAGS ( PortSettings , PortSetting )




explicit QxtSerialDevice ( const QString & device , QObject * parent = 0 )

Creates a new QxtSerialDevice with the specified parent and sets the device name to device.




QxtSerialDevice ( QObject * parent = 0 )

Creates a new QxtSerialDevice with the specified parent.




virtual qint64 bytesAvailable ( ) const




virtual void close ( )




bool open ( const QString & device , OpenMode mode )




virtual bool open ( OpenMode mode )




int handle ( ) const

Returns the file descriptor for the open device. If the device is not open, this function returns -1.




void setDeviceName ( const QString & device )

Sets the device name to device. This is a device node like "/dev/ttyS0" on UNIX or a device name like "COM1" on Windows.

See also: deviceName




QString deviceName ( ) const

Returns the current device name.

See also: device




bool setBaud ( BaudRate rate )




BaudRate baud ( ) const
